actions.title: Cleanup Actions
actions.cleanupDescription: Deletes temporary files uploaded more than 24 hours ago that were never saved.
actions.confirmCleanup: Are you sure you want to delete temporary files?

info.title: What are temporary files?
info.description: These are images that were uploaded but never saved (user uploaded an image but didn't save the space, gallery, or post). These files take up space in Cloudinary without being used.
info.recommendation: Recommendation: Run cleanup weekly to keep storage optimized.
